ItemTooltips.sphere: Great damage, conservative item, keeps you alive to let you pull off Time Lapse.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Evasion heroes despise Monkey King Bar. This item is straight damage and can be key to competing rivaling physical carries.
ItemTooltips.radiance: If doing incredibly well, consider getting radiance for Weaver, otherwise, skip it for cheaper damage-dealing items.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Linken's Sphere and Evasion makes Weaver difficult to catch even with True Sight when he casts Shukuchi.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Tear foes even faster with Daedalus as its critical strike is incredible powerful and great for a fast-moving and damaging hero like Weaver.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: Get Maelstrom for easy kills during your initial levels and for the fast ability to farm your Linken's Sphere. Without Maelstrom, your farm will be massively lower.
ItemTooltips.desolator: The armor reduction from this item works alongside your The Swarm ability, making your attack deal even more damage! Geminate Attack  still occurs even if you get Desolator.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: The armor reduction from this item works alongside your The Swarm ability, making your attack deal even more damage! Great if you want to early-game pressure instead of farming for your more core items.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Ring of Aquila provides easy last-hitting with the small mana regeneration you want to pop your Shukuchi at any time's notice.

AbilityTooltips.weaver_the_swarm:
The Swarm has a constant armor reduction (of 1) af every second at any level, so we are going to max it second, after Shukuchi.

This works alongside Desolator's Armor Reduction.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_shukuchi: Your escape and a positioning ability. Don't hesitate to spam this if necessary to deal safe damage to your opponent.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_geminate_attack: Items with orb effects work alongside this passive ability.
AbilityTooltips.weaver_time_lapse:
If stunned or silenced, you will not be able to cast this ability; so don't depend on it too much if you're in a jam.

Use this ability to rewind to a safe location even at full health.
